languages.text: {n}Голос Гапрак тяжел, как удары пресс-молота.{/n} "Осквернение Кьявы Гамма стало тяжелым ударом для моей семьи. Презренный Кубис Дельфим обманул наше доверие, осквернил соборы-кузницы, лишил жизни моего почтенного кузена".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Гапрак тяжел, как удары пресс-молота.{/n} "Осквернение Кьявы Гаммы стало тяжелым ударом для моей семьи. Презренный Кубис Дельфим обманул наше доверие, осквернил соборы-кузницы, лишил жизни моего почтенного кузена".

languages.text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Гапрак тяжел, как удары пресс-молота.{/n} "Осквернение Кьявы Гамма стало тяжелым ударом для моей семьи. Презренный Кубис Дельфим обманул наше доверие, осквернил соборы-кузницы, лишил жизни моего почтенного кузена".

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana's voice is heavy like the impacts of a forging hammer.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-temples, took my esteemed cousin's life."

{n}Toriana's voice is heavy like the impacts of a forging hammer.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-temples, took my esteemed cousin's life."

{n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

{n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

{n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

languages.text: {n}鍛冶場のハンマーのように、トリアーナの声が耳に重く響く。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマの崩壊はギャプラック一族にとって実に痛手でした。キュビス・デルフィムは卑劣にも信頼を裏切り、フォージ・カテドラルを破壊し、私のいとこの生命を奪ったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}鍛冶場のハンマーのように、トリアーナの声が耳に重く響く。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマの崩壊はギャプラック一族にとって実に痛手でした。キュビス・デルフィムは卑劣にも信頼を裏切り、フォージ・カテドラルを破壊し、私のいとこの生命を奪ったのです」

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜的声音仿佛锻锤一样，沉重地落在你的耳边。{/n}“基亚瓦伽马星的陨落，对我们的家族造成了沉重打击。卑鄙的库比斯·德尔菲姆辜负了我们的信任，亵渎了锻造教堂，夺走了我尊敬的堂兄的生命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜的声音仿佛锻锤一样，沉重地落在你的耳边。{/n}“基亚瓦伽马星的陨落，对我们的家族造成了沉重打击。卑鄙的库比斯·德尔菲姆辜负了我们的信任，亵渎了锻造教堂，夺走了我尊敬的堂兄的生命。”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Toriana resuena con fuerza cual martillo de forja.{/n} «La corruptela de Kiava Gamma supuso un duro golpe para mi familia. El sinvergüenza de Cubis Delphim falló a nuestra confianza, profanó las catedrales de la forja y truncó la vida de mi tan querido primo».
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Toriana resuena con fuerza cual martillo de forja.{/n} «La corruptela de Kiava Gamma supuso un duro golpe para mi familia. El sinvergüenza de Cubis Delphim falló a nuestra confianza, profanó las catedrales de la forja y truncó la vida de mi tan querido primo».

languages.text: {n}La voix de Toriana s'abat tel un marteau sur vos tympans.{/n} « La corruption de Kiava Gamma a porté un grand coup à ma famille. Cubis Delphim, cette méprisable vermine, a trahi notre confiance, profané les cathédrales-forges et tué mon très estimé cousin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Toriana s'abat tel un marteau sur vos tympans.{/n} « La corruption de Kiava Gamma a porté un grand coup à ma famille. Cubis Delphim, cette méprisable vermine, a trahi notre confiance, profané les cathédrales-forges et tué mon très estimé cousin. »

languages.text: {n}Torianas Stimme lässt das Ohr erbeben wie ein Schmiedehammer.{/n} "Die Verderbnis auf Kiava Gamma war ein schwerer Schlag für meine Familie. Der verachtenswerte Cubis Delphim hat unser Vertrauen missbraucht, die Schmiede-Kathedralen entweiht und das Leben meines geschätzten Vetters genommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Torianas Stimme lässt das Ohr erbeben wie ein Schmiedehammer.{/n} "Die Verderbnis auf Kiava Gamma war ein schwerer Schlag für meine Familie. Der verachtenswerte Cubis Delphim hat unser Vertrauen missbraucht, die Schmiede-Kathedralen entweiht und das Leben meines geschätzten Vetters genommen."

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın sesi, kulağa taş kadar ağır geliyor.{/n} "Kiava Gama'nın yozlaşması, aileme çok ağır geldi. Aşağılık Cubis Delphim; güvenimize ihanet etti, döküm katedrallerinin kutsallığına leke sürdü ve saygıdeğer kuzenimin canını aldı."
languages.original_text: {n}Like a forging hammer, Toriana's voice falls heavily on the ear.{/n} "The corruption of Kiava Gamma was a great blow to my family. The contemptible Cubis Delphim betrayed our trust, desecrated the forge-cathedrals, and took my esteemed cousin's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana'nın sesi, kulağa taş kadar ağır geliyor.{/n} "Kiava Gama'nın yozlaşması, aileme çok ağır geldi. Aşağılık Cubis Delphim; güvenimize ihanet etti, döküm katedrallerinin kutsallığına leke sürdü ve saygıdeğer kuzenimin canını aldı."
